ModMetaData.name: Legionary Equipment (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Zaljerem
ModMetaData.description:
Original mod by Sasha https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2770102841 If the original author requests it, I will remove this update.
--
If you run Vanilla Expanded Framework, shields are available. Children can now wear toga. Some apparel moved from Industrial to Medieval.
--
Original mod notes (1.3):
A Simple apparel mod recreating the apparel of Imperial Rome.
